modules.description: Converts between pipes of Cstruct.t and pipes of strings or Bigsubstrings. Works with Async.Pipe readers and writers. Useful for adapting network or file I/O pipelines to process data in different buffer formats.

This module bridges `Cstruct.t` with `Bigsubstring.t`, `Reader.t`, and `Writer.t`, enabling efficient buffer conversions and I/O operations. It supports direct reading from and writing to async streams using structured memory buffers, ideal for network protocols handling binary data. The child module extends this by transforming `Cstruct.t` pipes into string or bigsubstring pipes, facilitating interoperability in data processing pipelines. For example, it allows reading a binary message into a `Cstruct.t`, converting it to a bigsubstring for parsing, and streaming transformed data over a network socket using an async writer.
